Header: West Troops Listen to Talk on ' Drug Prevention'
Content: To be in line with the ongoing Presidential Task Force-initiated  drug eradication drive, Mr Rasika Weerathunga, an Instructor at Sri Lanka Sumithuro Melmedura and Vista Counseling service delivered a lecture on 'Drug Prevention' and its international network, etc to the troops serving the Security Forces-West. It was held at 9 Battalion Sri Lanka Light Infantry (SLLI) premises on Thursday (27). Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander, Security Forces-West has directed the General Officer Commanding, 14 Division to organize the arrangement.
